mapper.select: SELECT rcp_li.* FROM (SELECT rcp.*, rownum rm FROM (SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY rcp_seq DESC)rcp)rcp_li WHERE rm >=#{startRow} AND rm <= #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM recipe ORDER BY scrap DESC) WHERE rownum <= 3
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET rcp_viewcnt = rcp_viewcnt+1 WHERE rcp_seq = #{rcp_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe(rcp_seq, rcp_name, user_id, filename, filepath, time, difficulty, amount, summary, hash_tag, rcp_parts_dtls, rcp_date) VALUES(rcp_seq_seq.nextval, #{rcp_name}, '테스트', #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{difficulty, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hash_tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcp_parts_dtls, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO manual(manual_no, rcp_seq, manual_txt, filename, filepath) VALUES(#{manual_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT max(rcp_seq) FROM recipe) , #{manual_txt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, null)
